# enableFan

**Instance Property**

A Boolean value indicating whether to turn on the cabin fan system.

## Declaration

```swift
@nonobjc final var enableFan: Bool? { get }
```

## Discussion

Enabling the fan typically disengages the automated climate control systems and causes the vehicle to enter a manual mode. Check the [doc://com.apple.sirikit/documentation/Intents/INSetClimateSettingsInCarIntent/fanSpeedIndex-4c1rr], [doc://com.apple.sirikit/documentation/Intents/INSetClimateSettingsInCarIntent/fanSpeedPercentage-ep0u], or [doc://com.apple.sirikit/documentation/Intents/INSetClimateSettingsInCarIntent/relativeFanSpeedSetting] properties to determine whether the user specified a speed for the fan.

This property is `nil` when the user modified a different climate control setting.

## Getting the Fan Settings

- **fanSpeedIndex**: An integer value indicating the desired fan speed position.
- **fanSpeedPercentage**: A floating-point value indicating the requested fan speed specified as a percentage of the maximum speed.
- **relativeFanSpeedSetting**: A relative fan speed setting.
